basic.name: Tobias Haas
basic.summary: Transforming challenges into opportunities with cutting-edge technology. Driven by a love for elegant, robust code.

education.title: HTL Saalfelden (Higher Technical School)
education.sub_title: Informatic, St. Johann im Pongau, Austria
education.details: Currently in the 5th year of study, specializing in software engineering and application development. Focused on programming, system design, and IT infrastructure. Gained practical experience through projects and internships.

education.title: HTL Saalfelden (Higher Technical School)
education.details: Completed the first year of study specializing in building technology. Gained foundational knowledge in construction, civil engineering, and architectural design. Participated in practical projects and internships in the construction field.

experiences.title: Intern Software Developer
experiences.details: Developed software for a newly designed machine, enabling control of both lighting and the mode settings. Collaborated with the team to implement efficient solutions for hardware integration.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.details: I program and design user-friendly, functional, and modern websites. I use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks to turn ideas into impressive digital experiences.

skills.title: Game Development
skills.details: In addition to websites, I developed small games that combine creativity and technical challenges. I especially enjoy working with tools like Unity and Phaser to create interactive experiences.

skills.title: General Programming
skills.details: Whether it's automation, scripts, or prototypes, I love finding creative solutions to problems. I enjoy working with Python, C#, and JavaScript, and I'm always open to learning new languages and frameworks.

certificates.title: SAP-Certificate
certificates.details: Comprehensive knowledge in the use of ERP systems and business processes.

certificates.title: CISCO-Certificate
certificates.details: Skills in network administration and security.

certificates.title: Cybersecurity-Certificate
certificates.details: Knowledge in IT security and the protection of sensitive data.

certificates.title: Python-Certificate
certificates.details: Basic skills in programming and development with Python.
